byline.original: By KIMIKO DE FREYTAS-TAMURA and JOE COSCARELLI
byline.contributor: Kimiko de Freytas-Tamura reported from London, and Joe Coscarelli from New York. Reporting was contributed by Sewell Chan, Palko Karasz and Michael Wolgelenter from London, and Iliana Magra from Goring-on-Thames, England.

lead_paragraph: While admirers focused on Mr. Michael’s previously unreported donations and philanthropy, a more complicated image of his life in recent years loomed, as well.

headline.main: Portrait of George Michael Fills Out, Showing Pitfalls of Fame and Quiet Generosity
headline.print_headline: Portrait of Singer Fills Out, Showing Pitfalls of Fame and Quiet Generosity

snippet: While admirers focused on Mr. Michael’s previously unreported donations and philanthropy, a more complicated image of his life in recent years loomed, as well....
